attributes.action: Take pride and be fair to the English - make St. George's day a Bank Holiday.
attributes.additional_details: Politicians seem to hate the English. They attack our national identity, criticise us for flying the flag of St. George, charge us more for our medicines, charge our children £27,000 more for university tuition, apply an unfair funding formula so that the English have to subsidise the rest of the U.K., deny us representation through an English assembly/government and even deny us any the right to be proud of being English. Enough is enough. The English need to fight back for fairness and parity.
attributes.background: If the Scots get a St. Andrew's Bank Holiday (not to mention free university tuition compared to £27,000 for the English) and the Irish get a St. Patrick's Bank Holiday - why do the English lose out again in not getting a St. George's Bank Holiday? We're at the bottom of the pile for everything.
